doc.field: The specialty of this clean-lined Japanese delicatessen, all chrome and glass, is sozai , a Japanese concept of meals...
A sleek Japanese delicatessen brings handsomely prepared to-go fare to the Ferry Plaza.
The Japanese deli offers takeout of side dishes, main courses, fresh-fried foods, and salads. Signature dishes...
The sleek eating area of this Japanese deli includes a fantastic view of the bay.
